mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM R, C.* from (select * from RECIPE_REVIEW where RECIPENUM=#{review.rnum} order by NUM desc) C) where R between #{review.listInfo.firstRow} and #{review.listInfo.lastRow}
mapper.insert: { call RREVIEW_WRITE(#{reviewDTO.recipenum, mode=IN}, #{reviewDTO.writer, mode=IN}, #{reviewDTO.contents, mode=IN}, #{reviewDTO.rating, mode=IN}, #{result, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER}) }
mapper.delete: { call RREVIEW_DELETE(#{num, mode=IN}, #{rnum, mode=IN}, #{result, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER}) }
